column1: tsebo ake ubone pula etlang le tlokweng
bona mola pula etlang le tlokweng
ee ha e yo eo ueqhomisitseng
tsebo untseubapalang ka tlung ka mona
tsebo ere le nna keetse tadi
le wena ake uetse hodimo ka mona
ska mokuka tsebo abapale aeme ngwana enwa
keitse ha kere phusi utlontlohele mmannyeo
hana hleso dintho tsela maobane tsee kenengkentsekedietsa ke ding
tsebo phakisa ngwana enwa oseatonne mahlo tjena
mme mamello ha ana houfa makotomane
hakere ha ana hoofa makotomane ha atswinya
ngwana enwa owele hona jwale tjee
ha se serotatlung ngwana enwa weso monna
pota ka mahafing ka kwana monna
jwale tsebo ha kesatseha le wena jwale
